sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent implements OnInit{ type: string = "password"; isText: boolean = false; eyeIcon:string = "fa-eye-slash"; ngOnInit():void{ } hideShowPass(){ this.isText = !this.isText; this.isText? this.eyeIcon = "fa-eye" : this.eyeIcon = "fa-eye-slash"; this.isText ? this.type = "text": this.type = "password"; } }
